products_entries.section_context_for_this_product_block: U | GARBAGE YARD > U1 | FOAM WATER SPRAY SYSTEM
products_entries.full_product_description: Supply, erection , testing & commissioning of Deluge valve with dry pilot trim assembly,fitted with strainer, drain valve, pressure gauge, Pressure Switch, flame proof 3/2 way Solenoid Valve, air filter regulator etc. & manual release unit. The valve shall be electro-pneumatic double inter lock system as per scheme drawing.
products_entries.feature_or_specifications: assembly: dry pilot trim, included: strainer, included: drain valve, included: pressure gauge, included: pressure switch, included: flame proof 3/2 way solenoid valve, included: air filter regulator, included: manual release unit, system: electro-pneumatic double inter lock, reference: as per scheme drawing

products_entries.full_product_description: Supply,installation,testing and commissioning of Foam Sprinkler nozzle with necessary threaded fittings as per drawing. The sprinkler shall be Open Aspiration, Pendent type, K-42 with standard spray angle.End connection 1/2" NPT/BSP.UL/FM Approved.

products_entries.section_context_for_this_product_block: U | GARBAGE YARD > U1 | FOAM WATER SPRAY SYSTEM
products_entries.full_product_description: Supply, installation, testing and commissioning of Foam bladder tank vertical type ,manufacturing as per ASME, section-VIII part- I. The bladder material shall be BUNA-N. The Bladder Tank shall be supplied along with all necessary valves, Hydraulically Operated Foam Concentrae Control Valve ,fittingss & instruments as per Technical data sheet attached with Tender documents.
products_entries.feature_or_specifications: type: vertical, standard: ASME(american society of mechanical engineers) section-VIII part-I, bladder material: BUNA-N, included: all necessary valves, included: hydraulically operated foam concentrate control valve, included: fittings, included: instruments, reference: as per technical data sheet attached with tender documents

products_entries.full_product_description: Supply of AR-AFFF(3%) foam concentrate(PFOS/PFAS free) having sp. Gravity 1.0±.02 g/mlat 20⁰C  , PH 7.0-8.5 & viscosity 1200 ±300 cps.
products_entries.feature_or_specifications: type: AR-AFFF(3%), feature: PFOS/PFAS free, specific gravity: 1.0±.02 g/ml at 20⁰C, PH: 7.0-8.5, viscosity: 1200 ±300 cps

products_entries.section_context_for_this_product_block: U | GARBAGE YARD > U1 | FOAM WATER SPRAY SYSTEM
products_entries.full_product_description: Supply, erection, fabrication, testing of MS black steel pipe Heavy grade of thickness 5.4mm conforming to IS : 1239 Part -1 including all fittings viz. Elbows, tees, flanges, etc. reduces clamps, MS support dash fasteners etc. including painting the pipe with two coats of approved primer and two coats of approved  paint. Pipe joints shall be grooved with groove coupling. All related civil work, supports etc shall be of vendor's scope.
products_entries.feature_or_specifications: grade: heavy, standard: IS 1239 Part-1(indian standard 1239 part-1), fittings: elbows, fittings: tees, fittings: flanges, fittings: reducers, fittings: clamps, supports: ms support dash fasteners, coating: two coats of approved primer, coating: two coats of approved paint, joints: grooved with groove coupling, scope: all related civil work and supports of vendor's scope

products_entries.section_context_for_this_product_block: U | GARBAGE YARD > U3 | PA SYSTEM
products_entries.full_product_description: IP based Networkable touch screen paging station for selection of zones, supervision of system status, setting of scheduled broadcasts with the following functions: . Central exchage with Stand by CPU  . Built-in monitoring loudspeaker  . Goose-neck microphone  . LCD touchscreen display  . Audio input
products_entries.core_product_name: ip based networkable touch screen paging station
products_entries.feature_or_specifications: function: selection of zones, function: supervision of system status, function: setting of scheduled broadcasts, feature: central exchange with stand by cpu, feature: built-in monitoring loudspeaker, feature: goose-neck microphone, feature: lcd touchscreen display, feature: audio input
